short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Evelingo! Not only English learning tools

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Reading based on interest and mastering vocabulary unconsciously

Help master vocabulary when you read English articles or watch videos. Evelingo can assist you in visiting websites content quickly you are interested in and gradually learning and remembering words while browsing.
